user_story: As a customer, I want to be able to view the nutritional information and allergen information for each menu item so that I can make informed choices.
generated_ac:
1. The system shall display nutritional information for each menu item when selected by the user.
2. The system shall display allergen information for each menu item when selected by the user.
3. The system shall provide clear feedback if a user attempts to access information for a menu item that does not exist.
4. The system shall handle errors gracefully and ensure that the user can continue to navigate without disruption.
edited_ac:
1. The system shall display nutritional information for each menu item when selected by the user.
2. The system shall display allergen information for each menu item when selected by the user.
3. The system shall provide clear feedback if a user attempts to access information for a menu item that does not exist.
4. The system shall handle errors gracefully and ensure that the user can continue to navigate without disruption.
